column1: Sources: New Orleans Pelicans finalizing deal with NBL's Didi Louzada
[Wojnarowski] Didi Louzada has agreed on a new four-year deal with the New Orleans Pelicans, his agent Aylton Tesch tells ESPN.

[Birmingham Squadron] ðŸš¨BREAKINGðŸš¨ New Orleans Pelicans have assigned guard Didi Louzada the the Birmingham Squadron. The 6-5, 210 guard has has averaged 1.6 points and 1.0 rebounds in five games over the last two seasons for New Orleans.

[Wojnarowski] ESPN Sources: NBA has suspended Pelicans forward DiDi Louzada for 25 games without pay for violating the NBA/NBPAâ€™s Anti-Drug program. Louzada tested positive for Drostanolone and Testosterone.
